1. Why AI-generated images are being used for propaganda  NPR
  2. AI deepfakes a top concern for election officials with voting underway  ABC News
  3. AI is spawning a flood of fake Trump and Harris voices. Here’s how to tell what’s real.  The Washington Post
  4. When we asked these candidates questions, they answered with AI. Here’s why — and what we learned about AI’s limits  The San Diego Union-Tribune
  5. WATCH: ‘AI + 2024 Elections: Navigating A Messy Information Space’ hosted by Stephanie Sy  PBS NewsHour

item.title: AI-generated child sexual abuse imagery reaching ‘tipping point’, says watchdog - The Guardian
item.description:
1. AI-generated child sexual abuse imagery reaching ‘tipping point’, says watchdog  The Guardian
  2. The Age of AI Child Abuse Is Here  The Atlantic
  3. Ventura teen finds her voice lobbying for bill on AI child abuse  VC Star
  4. US prosecutors see rising threat of AI-generated child sex abuse imagery  KSL.com
  5. Texas school janitor allegedly used AI to create child porn with student faces, prosecutors say  NBC Los Angeles
